required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Rehabilitation After Covid19-Clinical Results and Predictive Factors
clinical_study.official_title: Rehabilitation After Covid19-Clinical Results and Predictive Factors for Rehabilitation Outcomes

brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of the study is to gain insight into the rehabilitation process and predictive factors for the outcome after rehabilitation in three patient groups:
1. SARS-CoV-2-positive patients in the isolation ward
2. Post-Covid-19 patients
3. Control group; matched for gender, age and co-morbidity

primary_outcome.time_frame: Measurements done at entry and at discharge of rehabilitation (time between: 4- 6 weeks)
primary_outcome.description: Timed Up and Go-Test TUG (Seconds; less=better, normal <10 Sec.)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Measurements done at entry and at discharge of rehabilitation (time between: 4- 6 weeks)
primary_outcome.description: FIM at entry and discharge (min 18, max 126 points; higher level= better functioning; )

primary_outcome.measure: Promis-10 (Promis= Patient reported outcome measurement information system)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Measurements done at entry and at discharge of rehabilitation (time between: 4- 6 weeks)
primary_outcome.description: Level of patient self rated functioning in daily activities (higher level= better self related functioning)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Measurements done at entry and at discharge of rehabilitation (time between: 4- 6 weeks)
primary_outcome.description: EQ5D- VAS (0-100; higher level = better quality of life)

arm_group.description: Patients assigned to rehab which had to be treated in isolation wards dur to active disease
Patients assigned to rehab after active disease, still having restrictions in activity and particiaption
Pateints assigned to rehabilitation in the same time period without any signs of Sars-coV-2 infection

study_pop.textblock: All patients referred to rehabilitation between March and June 2020 either with active Covid19, post-Covid-State oor other indications for inpatient rehab (eg. muskuloskelettal, cancer, pulmonary diseases not related to Covid19)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients assigned to rehab
- Written informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- not able to fill in questionnaires in German
